name: Bite
description: Hellhound lunges one square to bite at player.

name: Bite
description: Bat lunges at player to attack.

name: Slash
description: Shambling Horror swipes at player with a melee that reaches 2 squares.

name: Bite
description: Arachnid leaps from the wall in an arc covering up to four squares to bite player.

name: Web
description: Arachnid shoots web from the shadows where it lurks to bind player in place.

name: Blood Boil
description: Blood Golem charges its blood and sprays a fountain of blood to coat the player in corrosive blood dealing lingering damage.

name: Sling
description: Blood Golem collects coagulated blood and bits of bone to fling at player.

name: Stoneskin
description: Takes reduced kinetic damage. Half elemental damage. Increased damage taken by counters attacks.

name: Take Flight
description: Gargoyle takes to the skies and enables the use of unique flying attacks.

name: Ground Swipe
description: Gargoyle swipes while on the ground

name: Ground Slam
description: Gargoyle jumps up and slams down

name: Dive
description: While flying dive quickly in a diagonal at player within 10 square range.

name: Roaring Screech
description: Performs Screech attack but successful hits stun player.

name: Fire Breath
description: Fire breath attack

name: Buffet
description: While grounded it uses wings to buffet player with a melee attack that reaches 3 squares

name: Air Slash
description: Gargoyle blocks then counters player attack by slashing with its claws. Flashes red and raises arms to indicate it is blocking.

description: Death Bringer swipes at player with blade
